alert.note: Alert for Benton; Marshall (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 10 at 4:08PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Marshall, northwestern Benton, southern Fayette and southwestern Hardeman Counties through 445 PM CDT... At 407 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles north of Slayden, or 13 miles east of Collierville, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Michigan City, Lagrange, Rossville, Moscow, Williston, Grand Junction, La Grange, Hays Crossing, Pattersonville, Forty Five, Early Grove and Ghost River State Natural Area. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
